meanings.definition: Capable of being perceived or measured
meanings.sent1: The difference in size was appreciable even to the smallest child.
meanings.sent2: The increase in temperature was appreciable, making everyone feel warmer.
meanings.sent3: The appreciable amount of candy left in the jar tempted the children.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an appreciable light in the darkness of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the storm was appreciable, with trees uprooted and roofs damaged.

meanings.sent4: His talent was an appreciable asset to the team, leading them to victory.
meanings.sent5: The appreciable smell of fresh bread filled the entire bakery, enticing customers.
